! exec ticketeer install
exec git init
exec git config user.email "i@mail.com"
exec git config user.name "name"
exec ticketeer install
exec git switch -c feature/PRJ-123
exec git add foo.sh
exec git commit -m 'chore: add script'
exec git log -1
stdout 'chore: add script\n'
stdout 'PRJ-123'

-- foo.sh --
#!/bin/sh
echo "Hello, world!"
